entry.summary: 国际清算银行 (BIS) 最近宣布成立跨境支付互操作性和扩展 (PIE) 工作组，工作组成员中包括 Ripple。 该工作组是国际清算银行支付和市场基础设施委员会的一部分，将通过改善支付系统的访问、延长支付系统的运行时间以及在不同支付系统之间建立链接来增强跨境支付。

Literal pvp… can’t get more degen than this
McKenna: There's an on-chain game of russian roulette where people are betting $10k per round. If you lose you lose everything. 90% of your stake goes to other players and 10% is burnt/rev share. The Telegram is absolutely wild.

entry.summary: Re @RNR_0 Technically it’s not a probability of 1/6. If 5/6 chambers are empty then bullet will be heavier. So when you spin it it’s more likely to not be at the top hole, because gravity.
